maze

Cell

class larvaworld.lib.model.envs.maze.Cell(x, y)[source]

Bases: object

A cell in the maze.

A maze “Cell” is a point in the grid which may be surrounded by walls to the north, east, south or west.

has_all_walls()[source]

Does this cell still have all its walls?

knock_down_wall(other, wall)[source]

Knock down the wall between cells self and other.

wall_pairs = {'E': 'W', 'N': 'S', 'S': 'N', 'W': 'E'}

Bases: object

A Maze, represented as a grid of cells.

Return the Cell object_class at (x,y).

find_valid_neighbours(cell)[source]

Return a list of unvisited neighbours to cell.
